data.title: Martin Lawrence's Tragic Passing Leaves Fans Devastated
data.meta_description: Has Martin Lawrence passed away? The answer is no.
data.text:
Has Martin Lawrence passed away? The answer is no.

Martin Lawrence is an American actor, comedian, writer, and producer. He is best known for his roles in the Bad Boys franchise, the Big Momma's House franchise, and the sitcom Martin. Lawrence has also starred in several other films, including Boomerang, Life, and Blue Streak. He has also released several comedy albums, including Talkin' Shit and Funk It.

Lawrence is a successful actor and comedian who has been in the entertainment industry for over 30 years. He has won numerous awards for his work, including two NAACP Image Awards and a BET Comedy Award. Lawrence is also a philanthropist who has donated millions of dollars to various charities.

Lawrence is still alive and well. He is currently working on several projects, including a new film and a new television show.
